meta.content: The New School of San Francisco is a public school committed to inquiry based, equity and personalized learning. We are a K-12 school currently serving K-4th grade.

link.script:
{"url":"https://www.newschoolsf.org","name":"New School San Francisco","description":"
The New School of San Francisco is currently a K-3, tuition-free public school committed to inquiry, equity and personalized learning. We are creating the first intentionally diverse and progressive K-12 public school in San Francisco and establishing NSSF as a laboratory school for teaching and learning.","image":"//static1.squarespace.com/static/55391fb4e4b05ff3f1e0b145/t/55c91a09e4b08ff4eaa7e8fb/1586463143706/","@context":"http://schema.org","@type":"WebSite"}

{"legalName":"New School of San Francisco (NSSF)","address":"655 De Haro Street\nSan Francisco, CA, 94107\nUnited States","email":"info@newschoolsf.org","telephone":"(415) 401 8489","sameAs":["mailto:info@newschoolsf.org","https://twitter.com/NewSchoolSF","https://www.facebook.com/The-New-School-of-San-Francisco-1450834388493338/","https://www.linkedin.com/company/6399747/","https://www.instagram.com/newschoolsf/"],"@context":"http://schema.org","@type":"Organization"}

{"address":"3524 Fulton Street\nSan Francisco, CA, 94118\nUnited States","image":"https://static1.squarespace.com/static/55391fb4e4b05ff3f1e0b145/t/55c91a09e4b08ff4eaa7e8fb/1586463143706/","name":"New School of San Francisco (NSSF)","openingHours":"Mo 07:45-18:00, Tu 07:45-18:00, We 07:45-18:00, Th 07:45-18:00, Fr 07:45-18:00, , ","@context":"http://schema.org","@type":"LocalBusiness"}

body.script: /* Must be below squarespace-headers */(function(){var e='ontouchstart'in window||navigator.msMaxTouchPoints;var t=document.documentElement;if(!e&&t){t.className=t.className.replace(/touch-styles/,'')}})()

div.p: The New School of San Francisco is a tuition-free public school designed in partnership with local educators, parents and community leaders. Inquiry, equity and personalized learning are at the heart of how our students learn, grow and thrive. We are a K-12 school currently serving kindergarten through fifth grade.

Our mission is to demonstrate a holistic 21st century education that instills a love of learning now and prepares students and families for success in the future.
We believe in "Inquiry for All" – all children should go to school where they can drive their learning, ask big questions and take risks. This belief fueled the creation of our school in 2015.

div.data-block-json: {"blockAnimation":"none","layout":"caption-hidden","overlay":false,"description":{"html":"At The New School of San Francisco, we teach children through inquiry arcs -- a series of student-driven investigations rooted in their questions, strengths and passions. We do it in a public school setting because we believe all children deserve access to deeper learning."},"hSize":null,"floatDir":null,"html":"<iframe src=\"//www.youtube.com/embed/v7jzR7569K4?time_continue=424&wmode=opaque&enablejsapi=1\" height=\"480\" width=\"854\" scrolling=\"no\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\">\n</iframe>","url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?time_continue=424&v=v7jzR7569K4","thumbnailUrl":"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/v7jzR7569K4/hqdefault.jpg","resolvedBy":"youtube"}

div.data-title: Kristen Smith, Teacher: Literacy at New School

div.p: Learning at New School SF is “hands-on, minds-on.” Our inquiry and student-centered approach embraces each student’s curiosity and encourages learners to construct their own meaning and knowledge through hands-on experiences. Our school is diverse by design with families from all over San Francisco, and we are intentionally practicing equity in all we do. Finally, we take a personalized approach to ensure all students thrive in school and beyond.

New School San Francisco believes this approach will foster a deep love of learning while preparing students with the problem-solving and social emotional skills needed to confidently meet the challenges and opportunities of the 21st century.

div.h3: 655 De Haro St., San Francisco, CA 94107
